summary: REQ-44 is only partially addressed: the canonical googleMapsLink is kept, but the embed URL appears to use placeholder/fake data and the Contact page iframe uses a separate fallback query URL, so the embed is not clearly guaranteed to point to the exact same location as the provided maps.app.goo.gl link. REQ-45 is partially addressed with improved Tailwind styling, but the diff introduces new hardcoded English UI text (not via existing i18n keys), which conflicts with the requirement to keep using existing i18n keys.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsEmbedUrl to a valid Google Maps embed URL that shows the correct Rajdhani Beej Bhandar location using ONLY the provided location link, and ensure iframe + "Open in Google Maps" point to the same correct location.
missing_requirements.reason: The embed URL in constants appears to contain placeholder/fake components (e.g., a dummy place id/params and generic coordinates), and the Contact page iframe uses googleMapsEmbedUrlFallback (a text query embed) rather than the canonical link-based embed; this does not demonstrate the embed is derived from/locked to the provided https://maps.app.goo.gl/ link nor that it will always show the exact same pin.
evidence: frontend/src/constants/contact.ts (googleMapsEmbedUrl includes "0x1234567890abcdef" and "4v1234567890"; coordinates look generic/unsourced)
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx (iframe src uses CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsEmbedUrlFallback, not googleMapsEmbedUrl)

missing_requirements.requirement: If the embed fails to load, the Contact page remains stable and usable (no crash) and the user still has a working "Open in Google Maps" link.
missing_requirements.reason: While a mapError state is introduced, the provided diff excerpt does not show any iframe error handler (e.g., onError) or a rendered fallback UI/behavior when an embed fails, so it is not evidenced that failure handling is implemented.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx (shows useState(false) for mapError, but truncated before any onError/fallback rendering is confirmed)

missing_requirements.requirement: User-facing text remains in English and existing i18n keys continue to be used (avoid introducing new hardcoded strings).
missing_requirements.reason: A new user-facing sentence is hardcoded instead of using an i18n key, which violates the "existing i18n keys continue to be used" constraint.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx (hardcoded text: "Get in touch with us for all your agricultural needs")

hallucinated_features.description: Added an additional CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsEmbedUrlFallback constant and wired the iframe to use it.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-44 only asks to update CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsEmbedUrl and ensure robust behavior; it does not request adding a new constant field for a fallback embed URL (even if it may be helpful).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json summary content unrelated to the Contact map fix/polish request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scoped to fixing Google Maps location and polishing the Contact map section UI, with no request to update project_state.json metadata.
evidence: project_state.json (summary text changed/contains unrelated scope items)

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt content (project documentation/index) unrelated to implementing REQ-44/REQ-45.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; appears to be ancillary metadata/documentation changes.
